variants.classicSideBySideDescription: Traditional checkout layout with form on left and order summary on right.
variants.multiStepFlowDescription: Progressive checkout flow with cart, shipping, and review steps.
variants.minimalistDesignDescription: Clean, streamlined checkout with simplified fields and visual hierarchy.
variants.accordionStepsDescription: Collapsible sections with clear progress indicators for each checkout step.
variants.cardLayoutDescription: Card-based information blocks with clear section separation and floating sidebar.

messages.emptyCartAlert: Your cart is empty. Please add items to checkout.
messages.deviceConfigError: There was an issue with the device information in your cart. Please try re-adding the device.
messages.configurationError: Order submission failed due to a configuration error. Please contact support.
messages.invalidConfigError: Order submission failed due to an invalid configuration. Please contact support.
messages.orderError: Could not submit order. Please try again.
messages.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your order...
messages.termsAndConditions: By completing your order, you agree to our Terms and Conditions. We will send a confirmation email along with a shipping label to your email address.

messages.termsAndConditionsShort: By placing the order, you agree to our terms and conditions.

validation.firstNameTooLong: First name must be 50 characters or less
validation.firstNameInvalidChars: First name can only contain letters, spaces, apostrophes, and hyphens
validation.lastNameTooLong: Last name must be 50 characters or less
validation.lastNameInvalidChars: Last name can only contain letters, spaces, apostrophes, and hyphens
validation.streetNameTooLong: Street name must be 100 characters or less
validation.streetNameInvalidChars: Street name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, and forward slashes
validation.houseNumberTooLong: House number must be 20 characters or less
validation.houseNumberInvalidChars: House number can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and forward slashes
validation.postalCodeTooLong: Postal code must be 20 characters or less
validation.postalCodeInvalidChars: Postal code can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and hyphens
validation.cityTooLong: City name must be 100 characters or less
validation.cityInvalidChars: City name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
validation.stateProvinceTooLong: State/Province must be 100 characters or less
validation.stateProvinceInvalidChars: State/Province can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
